character.name: Tucker
description: A retired saboteur. His cards manipulate <c=keyword>the enemy's shield</c> and <c=keyword>positioning</c>.

bluntAttack.name: Reversible move
bluntAttack.description: Completely negated by shields. This goes for effects it would otherwise apply, as well.

shieldSteal.name: Shield steal
shieldSteal.description: Steal up to <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> <c=status>SHIELD</c> from the enemy and apply it to yourself. If they have no shield, steal <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> instead.

description.single: Attack <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> space to the {{Direction}} of your cannon.
description.many: Attack <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces to the {{Direction}} of your cannon.

FuelLeak.name: Fuel Leak
FuelLeak.description: Take {0} damage for every space moved. Decreases by 1 at the end of each turn.

Buffer.name: Buffer
Buffer.description: Gain {0} <c=status>temp shield</c> each turn. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 afterwards.

AntiqueMotor.name: ANTIQUE MOTOR
AntiqueMotor.description: Gain 1 extra energy every turn. <c=downside>Gain 1 <c=status>FUEL LEAK</c> each turn.

ArtofWar.name: ART OF WAR
ArtofWar.description: When out of shields, gain a <c=card>Counter Attack</c>.

description.None: Move the enemy 1 space to the {{Direction}}. Gain a <c=card>Redirect</c>.
description.A: Move the enemy 2 spaces to the {{Direction}}. Gain a <c=card>Redirect</c>.
